subject: Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: The world champion Mikaela Shiffrin straddled a gate in the final run, handing the slalom title to Ana Goodman of Canada in the United States Alpine Championships.
snippet: The world champion Mikaela Shiffrin straddled a gate in the final run, handing the slalom title to Ana Goodman of Canada in the United States Alpine Championships.
